config.sql: update tb_match_jczq set cmname = ?, csname = ?, cendtime = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1/24/60, cmatchtime = to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), close = ?, cmatchname = ?, ccolor = ?, cname = ? , cupdate = sysdate where imatchid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set cspf = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set crspf = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set crspf = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set ccbf = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set cbqc = ? where citemid = ?
update tb_match_jczq set cjqs = ? where citemid = ?
select count(1) num from tb_sp_jczq where cgameid=? and citemid=? and cadddate=to_date(?,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
